title: About this site
excerpt:
KevOps is an independent publication launched in September 2025 by Kevin Austin. If you subscribe today, you'll get full access to the website as well as email newsletters about new content when it's available. Your subscription makes this site possible, and allows KevOps to continue to exist. Thank you!
